verses.text: And \add this is\add* all Israel, \add even\add* their enrolment: and these \add are\add* written down in the book of the kings of Israel and Juda, with the \add names of them\add* that were carried away to Babylon for their transgressions.
And they that lived before in their possessions in the cities of Israel, the priests, the Levites, and the appointed ones.
And there lived in Jerusalem some of the children of Juda, and of the children of Benjamin, and of the children of Ephraim, and Manasse.
And Gnothi, and the son of Samiud, the son of Amri, the son of Ambraim, the son of Buni, son of the sons of Phares, the son of Juda.
And of the Selonites; Asaia his firstborn, and his sons.
Of the sons of Zara; Jeel, and their brethren, six hundred and ninety.
And of the sons of Benjamin; Salom, son of Mosollam, son of Odouia, son of Asinu.
And Jemnaa son of Jeroboam, and Elo: these \add are\add* the sons of Ozi the son of Machir: and Mosollam, son of Saphatia, son of Raguel, son of Jemnai;
and their brethren according to their generations, nine hundred and fifty-six, all the men \add were\add* heads of families according to the houses of their fathers.
And of the priests; Jodae, and Joarim, and Jachin,
and Azaria the son of Chelcias, the son of Mosollam, the son of Sadoc, the son of Maraioth, the son of Achitob, the ruler of the house of God;
and Adaia son of Iraam, son of Phascor, son of Melchia, and Maasaia son of Adiel, son of Ezira, son of Mosollam, son of Maselmoth, son of Emmer;
and their brethren, chiefs of their families, a thousand seven hundred and sixty, mighty \add men\add* for the work of the ministration of the house of God.
And of the Levites; Samaia son of Asob, son of Ezricam, son of Asabia, of the sons of Merari.
And Bacbacar, and Ares, and Galaal, and Matthanias son of Micha, son of Zechri, son of Asaph;
and Abdia, son of Samia, son of Galaal, son of Idithun, and Barachia son of Ossa, son of Helcanaâ€”who lived in the villages of the Notephatites.
The doorkeepers; Salom, Acum, Telmon, and Diman, and their brethren; Salom \add was\add* the chief;
and \add he waited\add* hitherto in the king's gate eastward: these \add are\add* the gates of the companies of the sons of Levi.

And Sellum the son of Core, the son of Abiasaph, the son of Core, and his brethren belonging to the house of his father, the Corites \add were\add* over the works of the service, keeping the watches of the tabernacle, and their fathers over the camp of the Lord, keeping the entrance.
And Phinees son of Eleazar was head over them before the Lord, and these \add were\add* with him.
Zacharias the son of Mosollami \add was\add* keeper of the door of the tabernacle of witness.

All the chosen porters in the gates \add were\add* two hundred and twelve, these \add were\add* in their courts, \add this was\add* their distribution: these David and Samuel the seer established in their charge.
And these and their sons \add were\add* over the gates in the house of the Lord, and in the house of the tabernacle, to keep watch.
The gates were toward the four winds, eastward, westward, northward, southward.
And their brethren \add were\add* in their courts, to enter in weekly from time to time with these.
For four strong \add men\add* have the charge of the gates; and the Levites were over the chambers, and they keep watch over the treasures of the house of God.
For the charge \add was\add* upon them, and these \add were\add* charged with the keys to open the doors of the temple every morning.
And \add some\add* of them \add were appointed\add* over the vessels of service, that they should carry them in by number, and carry them out by number.
And \add some\add* of them \add were\add* appointed over the furniture, and over all the holy vessels, and over the fine flour, the wine, the oil, the frankincense, and the spices.
And some of the priests were makers of the ointment, and \add appointed to prepare\add* the spices.
And Matthathias of the Levites, (he \add was\add* the firstborn of Salom the Corite,) \add was set\add* in charge over the sacrifices of meat-offering of the pan belonging to the high priest.
And Banaias the Caathite, from among their brethren, \add was set\add* over the show bread, to prepare it every sabbath.
And these \add were\add* the singers, heads of families of the Levites, \add to whom were\add* established daily courses, for they were employed in the services day and night.
These \add were\add* the heads of the families of the Levites according to their generations; these chiefs lived in Jerusalem.
And Jeel the father of Gabaon lived in Gabaon; and his wife's name \add was\add* Moocha.
And his firstborn son \add was\add* Abdon, and \add he had\add* Sur, and Kis, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab,
and Gedur and \add his\add* brother, and Zacchur, and Makeloth.
And Makeloth begot Samaa: and these lived in the midst of their brethren in Jerusalem, \add even\add* in the midst of their brethren.
And Ner begot Kis, and Kis begot Saul, and Saul begot Jonathan, and Melchisue, and Aminadab, and Asabal.
And the son of Jonathan \add was\add* Meribaal: and Meribaal begot Micha.
And the sons of Micha \add were\add* Phithon and Malach, and Tharach.
And Achaz begot Jada: and Jada begot Galemeth, and Gazmoth, and Zambri; and Zambri begot Massa.
And Massa begot Baana, and Rhaphaia \add was\add* his son, Elasa his son, Esel his son.
And Esel had six sons, and these \add were\add* their names; Esricam his firstborn, and Ismael, and Saraia, and Abdia, and Anan, and Asa: these \add were\add* the sons of Esel.
